para.sentence: For x real, \cosh x\leq\left(\frac{\sinh x}{x}\right)^{3}, \sin x\cos x<\tanh x<x, if x>0, |\cosh x-\cosh y|\geq|x-y|\sqrt{\sinh x\sinh y}, if x>0, y>0, \operatorname{arctan}x\leq\tfrac{1}{2}\pi\tanh x, if x\geq 0.
For these and other inequalities involving hyperbolic functions seeMitrinović (1964, pp. 61, 76, 159) andMitrinović (1970, p. 270).
